list.name: Enable Scrollbar
list.desc: The Scrollbar will be exposed for People without a Wheelmouse!

list.name: Performance Graph
list.desc: Show's the Performance Graph with Frametimes and Frames Per Second in the Window.

list.name: Background Update
list.desc: Updates the Graph constantly and not only when visible. May has some slight performance impact. Has no effect when the Overlay is visible.

list.name: Show Graph Overlay
list.desc: Show's a permanent Overlay of the Performance Graph and disables it in the Main Window.

list.name: Overlay Position
list.desc: Places the Graph Overlay on a specific Position. Left to Right and top to bottom.

list.name: Window Transparency
list.desc: Places the Graph Overlay on a specific Position. Left to Right and top to bottom.

list.name: Enable Debug
list.desc: Activates Debug Mode with verbose logging to the cet console.

list.name: Enable Resize
list.desc: Allows resizing the main window for testing purposes.
